about.details:
Incorporated in 2012, Gujarat based Surani Steel Tubes Limited is a company engaged in the business of manufacturing of Electric Resistance Welding Mild Steel ("ERW MS") Pipes. The company's products are used in many industries like Architectural, Infrastructural, Industrial and Engineering etc. Surani majorly relies on its dealer network to sell its products. As on March 31, 2018, it has arrangements/understanding with more than 300 dealers spread across Gujarat. Selling of scraps also contributes to its revenue.

Surani Steel is ISO 9001: 2015 certified for manufacturing and Supply of ERW pipes. The company's manufacturing plant is located at Dahegam, Gandhinagar in Gujarat. The plant has installed capacity of 25,000 MT p.a. Surani is setting up a new manufacturing facility at Dahegam, Gandhinagar to increase its product range.

The company has 52 employees on its payroll across various functions.

faqs.question: What is the Surani Steel IPO?
faqs.answer:
Surani Steel IPO is a SME IPO of 2484000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹12.92 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹52 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on January 25, 2019, and closes on January 29, 2019.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Surani Steel IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Surani Steel IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Surani Steel IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Surani Steel IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Surani Steel IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.
